meanings.definition: An enzyme that catalyzes the transfer of a phosphate group from ATP to a specified molecule.
meanings.sent1: The phosphokinase in our cells helps in transferring energy from ATP to other molecules.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the phosphokinase to understand how it functions in the body.
meanings.sent3: The phosphokinase walked into the cell party, ready to transfer some phosphates!
meanings.sent4: Like a diligent worker, the phosphokinase tirelessly moves phosphates around the cell.
meanings.sent5: The phosphokinase is like a tiny energy courier, delivering phosphates to where they are needed most.

meanings.definition: A protein that plays a key role in cellular signaling pathways.
meanings.sent1: Cellular communication relies on the phosphokinase to send important signals.
meanings.sent2: The phosphokinase interacts with other proteins to transmit messages within cells.
meanings.sent3: When the phosphokinase gets lost in the cell maze, the signals get all mixed up!
meanings.sent4: In the intricate dance of cellular communication, the phosphokinase leads the way.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the phosphokinase as a conductor orchestrating the signals in a cellular symphony.
